title: Surveys
description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by sources pulling survey data.

survey_responses_table_name.title: Survey Responses Table Name
survey_responses_table_name.description: The name of the table that contains survey responses.

survey_metadata_table_name.title: Survey Metadata Table Name
survey_metadata_table_name.description: The name of the table that contains survey metadata.

question_metadata_table_name.title: Question Metadata Table Name
question_metadata_table_name.description: The name of the table that contains question metadata.

question_category_mapping.title: Question Category Mapping
question_category_mapping.description: JSON map from source survey question categories to Faros question categories.

column_names_mapping.title: Column Names Mapping
column_names_mapping.description: Indicates the columns that contain the survey data in the source records.

survey_name_column_name.title: Survey Name Column Name
survey_name_column_name.description: The name of the column that contains the survey name.

survey_type_column_name.title: Survey Type Column Name
survey_type_column_name.description: The name of the column that contains the survey type.

survey_started_at_column_name.title: Survey Started At Column Name
survey_started_at_column_name.description: The name of the column that contains the survey started at timestamp.

survey_ended_at_column_name.title: Survey Ended At Column Name
survey_ended_at_column_name.description: The name of the column that contains the survey ended at timestamp.

survey_description_column_name.title: Survey Description Column Name
survey_description_column_name.description: The name of the column that contains the survey description.

survey_status_column_name.title: Survey Status Column Name
survey_status_column_name.description: The name of the column that contains the survey status.

respondent_name_column_name.title: Name Column Name
respondent_name_column_name.description: The name of the column that contains the respondent name.

respondent_email_column_name.title: Email Column Name
respondent_email_column_name.description: The name of the column that contains the respondent email.

respondent_team_name_column_name.title: Team Name Column Name
respondent_team_name_column_name.description: The name of the column that contains the name of the respondent's team.

respondent_team_id_column_name.title: Respondent Team ID Column Name
respondent_team_id_column_name.description: The name of the column that contains the unique identifier for the respondent's team.

question_category_column_name.title: Question Category Column Name
question_category_column_name.description: The name of the column that contains the question category.

response_type_column_name.title: Response Type Column Name
response_type_column_name.description: The name of the column that contains the question response type.

question_column_name.title: Question Column Name
question_column_name.description: The name of the column that contains the question text.
